description: A tiny 4-stop loop near home to test onsite/offsite detection, prompts, and autoplay.

stops.name: House
stops.teaser: Launch pad for the local test loop.
stops.narration_text: This is your start point. When you tap Play, we’ll snap a high-accuracy location and classify onsite/offsite immediately. Walk west toward the church to trigger approach/arrival.

stops.name: Church
stops.teaser: Short hop to verify APPROACH and ARRIVE prompts.
stops.narration_text: You’re near the church. If autoplay is on and you’re within the arrival radius, narration should start hands-free. Try stepping just outside and back in to test unlatch/re-latch.

stops.name: Fire Station
stops.teaser: Second prompt—good to test dwell timing.
stops.narration_text: This stop helps you test DWELL timing and the approach/arrive banners. Walk slowly through the radius to watch the latches behave.

stops.name: Park
stops.teaser: Final stop to test coda → next logic (there is no next).
stops.narration_text: Final stop. When narration ends, you’ll see a banner and no auto-advance, since this is the last stop. Use this to test end-of-tour flow before the wrap-up.
